headline.print_headline: Coke Yearns for Higher Margins to Tempt Franchisees
headline.main: Coke Yearns for Higher Margins to Tempt Franchisees

docs.snippet: Coca-Cola Co may have annual profits of about $9.3 billion, but that princely sum could fall short of what the world's largest soda maker needs to tempt would-be franchisees into taking over more of its regional bottling operations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola Co may have annual profits of about $9.3 billion, but that princely sum could fall short of what the world's largest soda maker needs to tempt would-be franchisees into taking over more of its regional bottling operations.

headline.print_headline: Big 12 Commish's Dire Warning About Pending Change
headline.main: Big 12 Commish's Dire Warning About Pending Change

docs.lead_paragraph: Big 12 Commissioner Bob Bowlsby had a dire warning Monday for anyone who likes intercollegiate athletics the way they are now.

docs.snippet: The full 25-year run of "The Simpsons" will arrive on cable channel FXX with a summer marathon, to be followed this fall by a digital extravaganza that could turn other TV shows yellow with envy....

headline.print_headline: New York Court: Spanking Was Not Excessive
headline.main: New York Court: Spanking Was Not Excessive

docs.snippet: A New York court has ruled that a Long Island father used reasonable force when he spanked his 8-year-old son for cursing at an adult....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York court has ruled that a Long Island father used reasonable force when he spanked his 8-year-old son for cursing at an adult.

headline.print_headline: Giants Four-Time Pro Bowl Guard Snee Retires
headline.main: Giants Four-Time Pro Bowl Guard Snee Retires

docs.snippet: The New York Giants lost a member of the family on Monday when four-time Pro Bowl guard Chris Snee announced his retirement after 10 seasons with the National Football League club....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York Giants lost a member of the family on Monday when four-time Pro Bowl guard Chris Snee announced his retirement after 10 seasons with the National Football League club.

headline.print_headline: Facebook 'Selfie' Leads to Shoplifting Arrest in Illinois: Police
headline.main: Facebook 'Selfie' Leads to Shoplifting Arrest in Illinois: Police

docs.snippet: An Illinois woman made police work easy when she allegedly stole a colorful, leopard-pattern dress from a small boutique, then posted a picture of herself wearing it on Facebook, police said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Illinois woman made police work easy when she allegedly stole a colorful, leopard-pattern dress from a small boutique, then posted a picture of herself wearing it on Facebook, police said on Monday.

headline.main: A Good Night to All, or, More Cowbell!

docs.snippet: At The Times, the end of the workday was once accompanied by ceremony, train whistles, cowbells and even the shouts of an eccentric newsroom crier....
docs.abstract: At The Times, the end of the workday was once accompanied by ceremony, train whistles, cowbells and even the shouts of an eccentric newsroom crier.

headline.print_headline: Oil Gains Further on Concerns Over Ukraine, Gaza
headline.main: Oil Gains Further on Concerns Over Ukraine, Gaza

docs.snippet: The price of oil rose above $103 a barrel Tuesday on persisting jitters over the situation in Gaza, the standoff over the shooting down of a Malaysian airliner in Ukraine and expectations of a fall in U.S. crude inventories....
docs.lead_paragraph: The price of oil rose above $103 a barrel Tuesday on persisting jitters over the situation in Gaza, the standoff over the shooting down of a Malaysian airliner in Ukraine and expectations of a fall in U.S. crude inventories.
